list.abs: The soldiers decamped at dawn ., 士兵黎撤营.

means.word_mean: 1. the act of running away secretly (as to avoid arrest)

auth_sentence.content: When news of the decampment got out, more investors backed off.

auth_sentence.content: Holding her head up after the decampment of Verna's father had been a full-time job, and had given her a very stiff neck.
